mapper.select: SELECT seminar_entry.id , seminar_entry.seminar_id , seminar_entry.account_id , account.username , account.email , seminar_ticket.id ticket_id , seminar_ticket.seminar_id ticket_seminar_id , seminar_ticket.name ticket_name , seminar_ticket.price ticket_price , seminar_ticket.capacity ticket_capacity , seminar_entry.stripe_customer_card_id , seminar_entry.stripe_charge_id FROM seminar_entry LEFT OUTER JOIN seminar_ticket ON seminar_entry.seminar_ticket_id = seminar_ticket.id INNER JOIN account ON seminar_entry.account_id = account.id WHERE seminar_entry.seminar_id = #{seminarId} AND seminar_entry.stripe_transfer_id IS NULL AND seminar_entry.stripe_refund_id IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM seminar_entry WHERE seminar_id = #{seminarId} AND seminar_ticket_id = #{seminarTicketId}

SELECT seminar_entry.seminar_id , COUNT(seminar_ticket.id) count , seminar_ticket.name FROM seminar_entry INNER JOIN seminar_ticket ON seminar_entry.seminar_ticket_id = seminar_ticket.id WHERE seminar_entry.seminar_id = #{seminarId} GROUP BY seminar_ticket.id, seminar_ticket.name
SELECT seminar_ticket_id FROM seminar_entry WHERE seminar_id = #{seminarId} AND account_id = #{accountId}
